author: Sam Sutton
title: Forget Washington — corporate America is focused on governors right now
description: States’ assertion of decision-making power over commerce is nearly unprecedented — and it hasn’t been pretty, from the viewpoint of many businesses.
content:
People in protective gear administer tests for Covid-19 at a drive-through testing center in Paramus, N.J. | Seth Wenig/AP Photo
NEW YORK When Goldman Sachs directed more than 12,000 employees in the New York City metro area to work from home two weeks ago, … [+5900 chars]
